channel.description: Recent content in Unraid on eddie@fig.systems

item.title: Self Hosting
item.description: This is just a general overview of what I’m running. Updated sporadically, only includes things I’m actively using or have deployed. Networking In Production Unifi UDM Pro 3 APs PoE and non-PoE switches A certain number and variety of cameras Services Self-hosted: NGINX Proxy Manager Immich. Photo Backup. Paperless-NGX. Document storage Recipes. Recipes I’ve saved. DokuWiki. Personal wiki. MicroBin. “paste bin” share. FreshRSS. RSS agregator Forgejo. Git repos. Cloud Came from an azure shop years ago, current aws.
